title: wanted ranked team
body:
i am only bronze 1 i am not that flash a player but can do any role needed 
but basicly i just want a regular ranked team, that is willing to get better and play together on a regular basis, voice chat would be nice
i got a mic and headset  add me ingame we can chat or team up.
solo que can be really annoying at times

replies.body: add me, "vertigo rampage". i play support and also looking for a team to play on semi-regular basis with mic
